# Attendance Control Desktop
Biometric Time and Attendance System for Employees using Fingerprints.

## Features
- Fingerprint Enrollment: The system enables capturing and securely storing employees' fingerprints as a form of biometric authentication.
- Employee Management: The system facilitates storing and managing employee information, including first names, last names, and ID numbers.
- Attendance Registration: Employees can register their entry by authenticating their fingerprint.
## Tecnologies

## Fingerprint sensor
[![DY50](https://ae01.alicdn.com/kf/H3c2257f7cb574381a425d89cfbc360c5w/M-dulo-de-Sensor-de-lector-de-huellas-dactilares-DY50-FPM10A-m-dulo-ptico-de-huellas.jpg_Q90.jpg_.webp)](https://es.aliexpress.com/item/32840291331.html?gatewayAdapt=gloMsite2espPcglo2esp)
## Arduino configuration
1. connect the fingerprint sensor to the Arduino.
2. connect the Arduino to your PC.
3. open the Arduino IDE.
4. load the "dy50" file from this repository onto the Arduino.
5. configures the com port used by the arduino to use the com18 port

## Installation
1. clone the repository
2. create a database with the name "attendance_control" in MariaDB
3. run "attendance-control.exe".
